message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I've done my research and I believe it's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to make a fair offer of $900000 for the product. I think this is a great starting point for our negotiation, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're willing to pay $850000 for the product, but I'm still looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm offering you a new price of $925000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my original asking price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $925000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm proposing $887500. I believe this is a fair price for the product, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $875000. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to get closer to my original asking price. I'm offering you a new price of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my original asking price.
I appreciate your persistence, but $950000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $925000, but no higher. I'm hoping we can meet at this price and finalize the deal.
